title: Measure metric. Vol. 1. Doc Cranshaw and the kid: the medicine show

description: A medicine man and his grandson learn about metric measurement from residents of a Utah frontier town. Demonstrates the litre and the millilitre and methods for determining the volume of liquid and granular substances. Suitable for middle and upper primary level.
